name: ContentsOnly: kakaku.com magagize
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("magazine.kakaku.com") {

/* Non-display part */
#headerR,
#navigation,
.footerNavi-new,
#copyLight,
#menu,
#btmFuncBtns,
.buttonFrame,
#magazineLink,
iframe,
#relatedArticle,
#relatedLink,
.pageTop
{ display: none !important; }

/* Display part */
body,
#magazine,
#container,
#wrapper,
#main,
#articleHeader,
#camera,
#paging1,
#paging2,
#paging3,
#paging4,
#paging5,
#paging6,
.articleWrap01,
.articleWrap02,
.articleWrap03,
.articleWrap04,
.articleWrap05,
.articleWrap06,
.boxTop01,
.boxTop02,
.boxTop03,
.boxTop04,
.boxTop05,
.boxTop06,
.type01,
.type02,
.type03,
.type04,
.type05,
.type06
{
    width: auto !important;
    min-width: 0 !important;
    background: #ffffff !important;
    border: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    float: none !important;
}

}
